item.description: Home page hierarchy To create a unique layout for the homepage, you need to create a index.html file in the layouts folder. The layout from this file will be displayed on all homepages of all language versions. In the absence of this file, the layout is taken from layouts/_default/list.html. Layout If using the baseof template, you will need to initialize it first: Copied {{ define "main" }} <-- HERE'S THE LAYOUT --> {{end}} If, however, you just output the header and footer into separate parshals, it will be necessary to call them in the template:
